{{Description|[[Amber]] stumbled upon a camp of [[hilichurl]]s. The camp hides an interesting gadget and a most dangerous [[Krupp|opponent]]. Can she survive this encounter?}}
'''Dangerous Grounds''' is Chapter 5 of the ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' [[manga]].

==Summary==
At the [[Mondstadt Library|library]], the [[Collei|girl]] is fast asleep as [[Jean]] and [[Lisa]] continue to research quietly. Jean's [[Vision]] suddenly experiences strange reactions.

Meanwhile, [[Amber]] is scouting in the woods and accidentally stumbles upon a camp of [[hilichurls]]. She notices a strange device with the mark of the [[Fatui]], attached to the camp's structures. Amber then knocks the hilichurls unconscious and grabs the device. A giant [[Krupp|golem]] suddenly attacks her as Jean steps in.
